p: Nonmarital partnerships were assumed to form/dissolve among both unmarried (premarital sex) and married (extramarital sex) individuals, but at different rates. Rates of premarital/extramarital partnership formation followed a gamma distribution with parameters estimated using DHS data from 20 SSA countries [ 33] per Omori et al.[ 34] methodology. An average duration of 6 months was assumed for nonmarital partnerships, as a representative value informed by previous work [ 20, 35].
